name: Piano Teacher
overview: Would you like to know how to play the piano? You could purchase a piano and then learn music theory. OR You could just play Piano Teacher! Piano Teacher is a fun and interactive way to learn the piano. Designed to take you from a total beginner to a piano playing pro. Simply use the Touch Screen on the Wii U™ GamePad. You press the red key on the piano to easily learn 20 different popular songs. Each song lesson has been carefully crafted by world-renowned pianist and YouTube™ sensation Jen Msumba.
